subject: Re: IT new website - setting up staging on local hosting + some additional things
preview: waiting for go signal saw the inbox gmail from @victoriaV

full_threads.body: waiting for go signal saw the inbox gmail from @victoriaV

Hi Sophie,

Yes, we can definitely look to improve those scores over time - should be fine.

We'll just need to take a closer look once everything's onboarded into our system so we can properly assess what's possible and where we can make the biggest impact.

Thanks,
Andy
closing for now will wait for her go signal for staging

Hi Andy, that would be great - unfortunately our budgets are super tight on this now so any design changes will be a challenge but would be good to know. Will let you know once we have sign off.

Thanks
Sophie

Hi Sophie,

Very exciting. Would you like me to do a QA lap once final before passed to us?

I can see a few things to tidy up and can send in a loom.

The tool I was referring to is this one. We'll get it installed once we're hosting it:
https://clarity.microsoft.com/

Thanks again,
Andy

Hi Sophie,

Perfect—thanks for confirming!

Yes, we can manage the staging setup on the local hosting today. Just let us know once the dev team’s tweaks are complete, and we’ll get it actioned straight away.

Also sounds good on the timing for the heatmap and SEO—just give us a shout when you’re ready, and we’ll jump in.

Hi Allie

Yes that is correct.

Our dev team are just making a few final tweaks but understand they can manage this off the local hosting - if yes it would be great if you could action today.

I will let you know when ready to go live

And will also let you know when ready for heatmap set up and SEO actions - most likely later this week.

Thanks
Sophie

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Allie Borcena

full_threads.body:
Hi Sophie,

Happy Tuesday—and thanks for the update!

Just to confirm so we get this right: would you like us to set up a staging environment on your local hosting based on this site? → https://niwart.tech/investmenttrends

Once confirmed, we’ll:
  • Set up the staging site on your local server
  • Coordinate the push to live as soon as you're ready
  • Assist with adding the Microsoft Clarity heatmap tool once live

Also, our team will pull together some recommendations on how we can help enhance SEO under your subscription, more to come on that after the launch.

Let me know if we got it right and we’ll jump in!

Hi Andy and Team

We are looking to go live with our new website this week and our offshore web guys have asked if you could set up a staging site on our local hosting. Could you please confirm next steps to we can action this ASAP?

Andy - we have also added Yoast Premium to the new website and I am also keen for you to complete the QR testing we discussed.

Note on top of that I would be interested in how we could possibly work with you under our subscription to further enhance the SEO capability of the new website.

We would also like support once live to add the free Microsoft heatmap tool you recommended so we can track visitor usage.

You can view the current staging site here - Home - Investment trends

I look forward to hearing from you.

Sophie

Sophie O'Neill

Senior Marketing Manager

P +61 2 8248 8000

Level 6, 143 Macquarie Street | Sydney NSW 2000, Australia

investmenttrends.com


(I work Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Friday)
